name: Börse Berlin
goal:
Börse Berlin has two market places under one roof. Apart from traditional trading on Xontro Börse Berlin operates the trading platform ETS under the brand Equiduct. Equiduct Systems Ltd. is responsible for the operation, and the maintenance and further development of the trading system.

Börse Berlin has two market segments, the Regulated Market and the Open Market. The Open Market has the sub-segment Berlin Second Regulated Market (BSRM).
interests: Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union
euInitiatives: MIFID MiFIR MAD MAR and corresponding EU regulations with reference to TV
